languages.text: "Яви же нам шрамы, брат Ульфар, чтобы узрели мы след деяний твоих во плоти".
"Show us the scars, Brother Ulfar, that we may see the mark of your deeds in the flesh."
languages.original_text: "Яви же нам шрамы, брат Ульфар, чтобы узрели мы след деяний твоих во плоти".

traits.locale_text: "Show us the scars, Brother Ulfar, that we may see the mark of your deeds in the flesh."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Show us the scars, Brother Ulfar, that we may see the mark of your deeds in the flesh."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Show us the scars, Brother Ulfar, that we may see the mark of your deeds in the flesh."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "Show us the scars, Brother Ulfar, that we may see the mark of your deeds in the flesh."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Muéstranos las cicatrices, hermano Ulfar, para que veamos en tu carne la marca de tus hazañas».
languages.original_text: "Show us the scars, Brother Ulfar, that we may see the mark of your deeds in the flesh."

traits.locale_text: «Muéstranos las cicatrices, hermano Ulfar, para que veamos en tu carne la marca de tus hazañas».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “让我们看看你的伤疤，乌尔法兄弟。让我们看看你的功绩在肉体上留下的印记。”
languages.original_text: "Show us the scars, Brother Ulfar, that we may see the mark of your deeds in the flesh."

traits.locale_text: “让我们看看你的伤疤，乌尔法兄弟。让我们看看你的功绩在肉体上留下的印记。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「傷を見せてくれ、ブラザー・ウルファー。お前の行動が肉体に残した爪痕を見たい」
languages.original_text: "Show us the scars, Brother Ulfar, that we may see the mark of your deeds in the flesh."

traits.locale_text: 「傷を見せてくれ、ブラザー・ウルファー。お前の行動が肉体に残した爪痕を見たい」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Montrez-nous vos cicatrices, frère Ulfar, que nous puissions voir de nos yeux les preuves de vos hauts faits gravées dans votre chair. »
languages.original_text: "Show us the scars, Brother Ulfar, that we may see the mark of your deeds in the flesh."

traits.locale_text: « Montrez-nous vos cicatrices, frère Ulfar, que nous puissions voir de nos yeux les preuves de vos hauts faits gravées dans votre chair. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Zeigt uns die Narben, Bruder Ulfar, damit wir das Mal Eurer Taten im Fleisch sehen können."
languages.original_text: "Show us the scars, Brother Ulfar, that we may see the mark of your deeds in the flesh."

traits.locale_text: "Zeigt uns die Narben, Bruder Ulfar, damit wir das Mal Eurer Taten im Fleisch sehen können."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Bize yaralarını göster Kardeş Ulfar, yaptıklarının izlerini derinde görelim."
languages.original_text: "Show us the scars, Brother Ulfar, that we may see the mark of your deeds in the flesh."

traits.locale_text: "Bize yaralarını göster Kardeş Ulfar, görevlerinin izlerini derinde görelim."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
